description: The Super Galaxy Dai-Gurren, christened by Simon, is another colossal battleship-type Gunmen akin to the Arc-Gurren. It first appeared in the prologue of the first episode, before being formally introduced near the end of the third part of the series. During http://anidb.net/ch1561 [Lordgenome]`s era, the battleship was named the Cathedral Terra.
name: Chouginga Dai-Gurren
